workflow_rationale: Building entire foundation layer from scratch with multiple interconnected components (10 enums, 5 utilities, 9 domain entities) requiring cohesive domain-driven design. This is new feature implementation, not bugfix or refactor.

phases.name: Constants & Enums
phases.description: Define foundational type system with Int16 rawValue for Core Data compatibility

subtasks.description: Create Constants enum with app-wide configuration values (sleep boundary hour, validation ranges)

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created Constants.swift with all app-wide configuration values including validation ranges (height: 100-250cm, weight: 20-300kg, body fat: 1-60%), sleep boundary hour (2), activity level multipliers, BMR formula constants, diet score ranges, API limits, and warning thresholds.

subtasks.description: Create Gender enum (male/female with Int16 rawValue, displayName, Identifiable)

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created Gender.swift enum with male/female cases using Int16 rawValue for Core Data compatibility. Implemented CaseIterable, Codable, and Identifiable protocols. Added displayName computed property with Korean localization ("남성", "여성"). Includes comprehensive documentation with examples.

subtasks.description: Create ActivityLevel enum with 5 levels (sedentary to veryActive), TDEE multiplier property

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: ActivityLevel enum created with 5 levels (sedentary, lightlyActive, moderatelyActive, veryActive, extraActive). Each level includes displayName property and tdeeMultiplier property with values matching algorithm spec (1.2, 1.375, 1.55, 1.725, 1.9). Follows Gender.swift pattern with Int16 rawValue for Core Data compatibility.

subtasks.description: Create MealType enum (breakfast/lunch/dinner/snack) with displayName

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created MealType enum with breakfast/lunch/dinner/snack cases following existing enum patterns. Includes displayName property and Identifiable conformance.

subtasks.description: Create ExerciseType enum with 8 exercise types and baseMET values per intensity

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created ExerciseType enum with 8 exercise types (walking, running, cycling, swimming, weight, crossfit, yoga, other) following established patterns. Implemented baseMET values per spec (3.5, 8.0, 6.0, 7.0, 6.0, 8.0, 3.0, 5.0) and metValue(for:) method with intensity multipliers (0.8, 1.0, 1.2). Follows same pattern as Gender, ActivityLevel, and MealType enums with Int16 rawValue, displayName, and Identifiable conformance.

subtasks.description: Create Intensity enum (low/medium/high) with MET intensity multipliers

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created Intensity.swift enum with low/medium/high cases using Int16 rawValue for Core Data compatibility. Implemented metMultiplier property with correct MET intensity multipliers (0.8, 1.0, 1.2) per algorithm spec. Follows same pattern as other enums with displayName, CaseIterable, Codable, and Identifiable protocols. Includes comprehensive documentation with Korean localization.

subtasks.description: Create FoodSource enum (government API, USDA, user-defined)

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created FoodSource enum with three cases: governmentAPI (0), usda (1), and userDefined (2). Follows the established pattern from other enums with Int16 raw values for Core Data compatibility, displayName property, and Identifiable conformance.

subtasks.description: Create GoalType enum (lose/maintain/gain) with displayName

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Created GoalType enum with three cases: lose (0), maintain (1), and gain (2). Follows the established pattern from other enums with Int16 raw values for Core Data compatibility, displayName property with Korean localization ("감량", "유지", "증량"), and Identifiable conformance. Includes comprehensive documentation with examples.

subtasks.description: Create SleepStatus enum (bad/soso/good/excellent/oversleep) with static factory method from(durationMinutes:)

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes:
Successfully created SleepStatus enum with all required features:
- Int16 rawValue (0-4) for Core Data compatibility
- Five cases: bad, soso, good, excellent, oversleep
- displayName property with Korean localized names
- Static factory method from(durationMinutes:) with correct thresholds based on ERD spec
- Identifiable conformance
- Follows established codebase patterns from Gender, ActivityLevel, and Intensity enums
- Clean commit with descriptive message
Note: xcodebuild verification blocked in environment, but code follows all existing patterns correctly

subtasks.description: Create QuantityUnit enum (serving/grams) with displayName

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: Successfully created QuantityUnit enum with two cases: serving (0) and grams (1). Follows the established pattern from other enums with Int16 raw values for Core Data compatibility, displayName property with proper Korean/English localization ("인분", "g"), and Identifiable conformance. Includes comprehensive documentation with examples. File committed successfully.

phases.name: Swift Extensions
phases.description: Create Date and Decimal extensions for domain-specific operations

subtasks.description: Create Date+Extensions with age calculation, date manipulation helpers

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes:
Successfully created Date+Extensions.swift with all required functionality:
- Age calculation methods: Date.age(from:) static method and instance age(to:) method
- Date manipulation: adding(days:), adding(months:), adding(years:)
- Date components: year, month, day, hour, minute computed properties
- Start/end of day: startOfDay, endOfDay computed properties
- Date comparison: isSameDay(as:), isToday, isYesterday, isTomorrow
- Formatting helpers: yyyyMMdd, yyyyMMddHHmmss
All methods include comprehensive Korean/English documentation with examples. Follows established codebase patterns from Constants.swift and enum files. Clean commit completed.

subtasks.description: Create Decimal+Extensions with formatting and arithmetic helpers for body measurements

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes:
Successfully created Decimal+Extensions.swift with all required functionality:
- Formatting helpers: formatted0, formatted1, formatted2, formattedPercent for different precision needs
- Arithmetic helpers: rounded(to:), rounded0, rounded1, rounded2 for rounding to specific decimal places
- Conversion helpers: toDouble(), toInt(), toInt32(), from(_:) for type conversions
- Validation helpers: isInRange(min:max:), isPositive, isZero for value validation
- Calculation helpers: percentage(of:), valueFrom(total:), clamped(to:max:) for common calculations
All methods include comprehensive Korean/English documentation with examples. Follows established codebase patterns from Date+Extensions.swift. Clean commit completed. Note: xcodebuild verification blocked in environment, but code follows all existing patterns correctly.

phases.name: Core Data Model
phases.description: Define Core Data entities matching domain models in .xcdatamodeld

subtasks.description: Define all 9 Core Data entities in Bodii.xcdatamodeld with attributes matching domain entities

verification.command: xcodebuild -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' build 2>&1 | tail -5

subtasks.notes: This requires Xcode GUI or manual XML editing. Entity attributes must match domain entity fields exactly with Int16 for enums.

phases.name: Unit Tests
phases.description: Create unit tests for critical business logic

subtasks.description: Create DateUtilsTests with 02:00 sleep boundary tests (01:59 returns previous day, 02:00 returns current day, midnight edge case)

verification.command: xcodebuild test -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' -only-testing:BodiiTests/DateUtilsTests 2>&1 | tail -10

subtasks.description: Create ValidationServiceTests with input validation tests (height 100-250cm, weight 20-300kg, bodyFat 3-60%, name 1-20 chars)

verification.command: xcodebuild test -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' -only-testing:BodiiTests/ValidationServiceTests 2>&1 | tail -10

subtasks.description: Create SleepStatusTests with factory method tests (duration thresholds: <330=bad, 330-389=soso, 390-449=good, 450-540=excellent, >540=oversleep)

verification.command: xcodebuild test -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' -only-testing:BodiiTests/SleepStatusTests 2>&1 | tail -10

phases.name: Integration Verification
phases.description: Verify all components work together and build succeeds

subtasks.description: Run full test suite and verify no build errors or warnings

verification.command: xcodebuild test -project Bodii.xcodeproj -scheme Bodii -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' 2>&1 | tail -15

subtasks.description: Verify Core Data model loads all 9 entities correctly

steps: Build and run app in simulator
Check debug console for '✅ [Core Data] Model loaded successfully with all 9 entities'

parallel_groups.reason: Depends only on phase-1, can run while phase-3 utilities are being prepared
Tests for phase-3 utilities can run in parallel with phase-4 domain entities

parallelism.speedup_estimate: Sequential recommended due to iOS build dependencies

acceptance_criteria: All 10 enums defined with Int16 rawValue and displayName
ValidationService validates all input ranges per docs/08_EDGE_CASES.md
All 9 domain entities defined matching docs/04_ERD.md
Unit tests pass for DateUtils, ValidationService, SleepStatus
No Xcode build errors or warnings
verification_strategy.reasoning: Low risk foundational layer with unit tests explicitly included in task scope. Single iOS service with standard Swift/Core Data patterns.

checks: Core Data model loads all 9 entities
